name: part_014
file: tmp_【#癒月ちょこ3周年】３周年記念3D配信⚡重大告知あり！【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [spHKQDaz0C0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Yuzuki Choco announces the release of her song 'Chocolat' on streaming services and talks about the upcoming MV release.
Choco reveals the second significant announcement: her 3rd-anniversary commemorative merchandise.
Choco introduces the first item: a large rubber mat illustrated by Maki Hitsuji-sensei, depicting Choco in her infirmary.
Choco introduces the second item: a pass case with a simple design suitable for all fans.
Choco discusses the ASMR voice tracks included in the set, mentioning that many include ear-licking segments, and highlights the full set bonuses.
Choco concludes the merchandise announcement, reminding viewers to check the video description for purchase links.

subtitles.original: ということでね
subtitles.english: So then...

subtitles.original: 皆様、本日0時から配信開始でございます
subtitles.english: Everyone, it will be available for streaming starting at midnight tonight.

subtitles.original: そして MVは後日公開ということで
subtitles.english: And the MV will be released at a later date.

subtitles.original: 今回はね このライブの切り抜きが0時に一緒に上がるので
subtitles.english: This time, clips from this live show will be uploaded at midnight as well.

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひ皆様そちらでよく聴いてくださいね
subtitles.english: So please, everyone, listen to it plenty over there.

subtitles.original: MVは後日 お楽しみにしてください 完成を
subtitles.english: Please look forward to the completed MV in a few days.

subtitles.original: ということで！
subtitles.english: With that said!

subtitles.original: 重大告知 その2！
subtitles.english: Significant Announcement Part 2!

subtitles.original: ダダン！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: 癒月ちょこ3周年の記念グッズが発売されます！
subtitles.english: Yuzuki Choco's 3rd Anniversary commemorative goods are being released!

subtitles.original: いや今回はやばいんですよ 皆様いろいろと
subtitles.english: Wow, this time it's really something, everyone, in many ways.

subtitles.original: そう まずは ちょっとグッズ紹介から行こうかな
subtitles.english: Right, first, let me introduce the items.

subtitles.original: まずグッズ1つ目！
subtitles.english: First, the first item!

subtitles.original: 巻羊先生描き下ろしの 超特大ラバーマットー！
subtitles.english: An extra-large rubber mat illustrated by Maki Hitsuji-sensei!

subtitles.original: ということでね いやこれね 結構大きいんですよ サイズが
subtitles.english: So then... wow, this is actually quite large in size.

subtitles.original: そしてね いやチョコちょっとあの ニヤニヤしながらこのイラストを見てるんですけど
subtitles.english: And, well, Choco is looking at this illustration with a bit of a grin.

subtitles.original: そう チョコの保健室にいる感じで みんなと一緒にね 作業カタカタしながら
subtitles.english: Right, it feels like being in Choco's infirmary, working away on the computer with everyone.

subtitles.original: そう 一緒にね パソコンの前で楽しもうねっていう思いが詰まったイラストとなっております
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's an illustration filled with the hope that we can enjoy our time together in front of the computer.

subtitles.original: そして もう1つ！ドドン！
subtitles.english: And, one more thing! Boom!

subtitles.original: こっちだ
subtitles.english: Over here.

subtitles.original: パスケースー！
subtitles.english: A pass case!

subtitles.original: ということでね 今回チョコ名とパスケースということで 男性でも女性でも両方持てる
subtitles.english: So, this time it's a pass case with Choco's name, designed for both men and women to use.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね あのシンプル目なデザインにしてみました いかがでしょうか
subtitles.english: I tried to give it a somewhat simple design. What do you think?

subtitles.original: このパスケースね あの なんでパスケースにしたかは あのボイスを聴いてもらったらわかると思います
subtitles.english: As for why I chose a pass case... I think you'll understand once you hear the voice tracks.

subtitles.original: そう 今回のボイスドドンということで こっちだ
subtitles.english: Right, and here are this time's voice tracks, boom! Over here.

subtitles.original: KU100でね あの チョコ撮ったASMRボイス 全5種
subtitles.english: I recorded five types of ASMR voices using the KU100.

subtitles.original: プラス特典ボイス1種なんですけど いつもねチョコ特典ボイスしか耳舐めやんないんですけど
subtitles.english: Plus one bonus voice track. Usually, Choco only does ear-licking for the bonus track.

subtitles.original: 今回 今回普通の あのASMRボイスでも あのいくつか あの耳舐めボイスが入っておりまして
subtitles.english: But this time, some of the regular ASMR tracks also include ear-licking segments.

subtitles.original: そう あの 一番エッチなのは特典なんだけど あの特典ボイス全部セット買うと特典ボイスプラス描き下ろしポストカード
subtitles.english: The bonus track is the steamiest one, but if you buy the full set, you get that plus a newly illustrated postcard.

subtitles.original: がついてくるんだけど いつもねその特典ボイスしか耳舐めしてないんだけど
subtitles.english: As I said, I usually only do ear-licking for the bonus track.

subtitles.original: 今回 あの エッチなやついっぱい記念ボイス録っちゃったから
subtitles.english: But this time, I recorded a lot of steamy commemorative voice tracks.

subtitles.original: まあどれがね耳舐めか まあ5個中3つぐらい耳舐め入れちゃったから
subtitles.english: Which ones are ear-licking... well, I put ear-licking into about three out of the five tracks.

subtitles.original: まあどれが入ってるのかドキドキしながら聴いてもらえたらな って思うんだけど
subtitles.english: So I hope you'll be excited to find out which ones they are as you listen.

subtitles.original: この特典ボイスの中に あのチョコねえと夏休みっていうやつがあって
subtitles.english: In these bonus voice tracks, there's one called "Summer Vacation with Choco-nee."

subtitles.original: チョコねえに会うために ちょっと電車に乗って行くみたいな感じのを想像してパスケースにしました
subtitles.english: I imagined someone taking the train to go see Choco-nee, and that's why I made it a pass case.

subtitles.original: チョコねえに会うためにちょっとだからパスケースも一緒にいかがでしょうか ということで
subtitles.english: So, how about a pass case to go along with seeing Choco-nee?

subtitles.original: そうフルセットこちら買ってもらうとね なんと
subtitles.english: And if you buy the full set here, you get...

subtitles.original: 数量限定で 癒月ちょこ直筆ポストカード サイン入りポストカードと特典ボイスがついてきます
subtitles.english: A limited quantity of Yuzuki Choco's hand-signed postcards and the bonus voice track.

subtitles.original: でその一定の数量を越すと なんと直筆ではなく箔押し複製サインに変わるのですが
subtitles.english: Once that quantity is exceeded, the hand-signed signature will change to a foil-stamped replica.

subtitles.original: 特典ボイスはそのままついてくるので ぜひぜひフルセットの方チョコはおすすめします
subtitles.english: But the bonus voice track will still be included, so Choco highly recommends the full set.

subtitles.original: はい ということで
subtitles.english: Right, so then.

subtitles.original: それでは皆様 グッズのURLは概要欄に貼ってあるので
subtitles.english: Everyone, the link for the goods is in the description.

subtitles.original: ちょうど今 もう販売開始されてるのかな ぜひぜひご購入ください
subtitles.english: They should be on sale right about now. Please do consider buying them.

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: はい ということで まあね 深夜0時からチョコラブ配信されるのでぜひぜひ皆様お楽しみに
subtitles.english: Right, so then. Well, 'Chocolat' will be streaming from midnight, so please look forward to it.

subtitles.original: そしてこれから癒月ちょこいろいろとお披露目もあるので
subtitles.english: And there will be more reveals from Yuzuki Choco coming up.

subtitles.original: 皆様 ぜひぜひ...
subtitles.english: So everyone, please...
